problem.markdown:
>>Do you expect a short, wide column to fail in compression or by buckling?<< (x) Compression ( ) Buckling
[explanation] Explanation: a short wide column is more likely to fail in compression as buckling is a function of the height and moment of inertia. [explanation]
problem.p: Do you expect a short, wide column to fail in compression or by buckling?

choicegroup.label: Do you expect a short, wide column to fail in compression or by buckling?

div.p: Explanation: a short wide column is more likely to fail in compression as buckling is a function of the height and moment of inertia.
